alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:51PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Price County through 415 PM CDT... At 350 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prentice, or 25 miles south of Park Falls, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Prentice around 400 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ogema. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
